subject: Football
Football (College)
Wages and Salaries
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: The Alabama defensive coordinator Kirby Smart is receiving a hefty raise. University trustees on Tuesday approved a three-year deal that would be worth $3.85 million for Smart.
snippet: The Alabama defensive coordinator Kirby Smart is receiving a hefty raise. University trustees on Tuesday approved a three-year deal that would be worth $3.85 million for Smart.
